title: Saint-Denis, Réunion
summary: Saint-Denis (/ˌsæ̃dəˈniː/, French pronunciation: ​[sɛ̃ dəni], unofficially Saint-Denis de La Réunion for disambiguation; Reunionese Creole: Sin-Dni) is the préfecture (administrative capital) of the French overseas department and region of Réunion, in the Indian Ocean. It is located at the island's northernmost point, close to the mouth of the Rivière Saint-Denis.
